description:
Puts the focused window title in the top bar.

 Just the title, nothing else ! It can be used with the integrated menu option from GNOME Tweaks : menu inside application, window title in the topbar.

 Forked from https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1496/focused-window-indicator/ that does now include some other features.
name: Window Title In Topbar
